metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7884 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The vivid_fb_ioctl function in drivers/media/platform/vivid/vivid-osd.c in the Linux kernel through 4.3.3 does not initialize a certain structure member, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information from kernel memory via a crafted application. It was discovered that the virtual video osd test driver in the Linux kernel did not properly initialize data structures. A local attacker could use this to obtain sensitive information from the kernel.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7884` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:
